Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: If that were a real sword, you'd be dead. Lord Snow here grew up in a castle spitting down on the likes of you. Pyp. Do you think Ned Stark's bastard bleeds like the rest of us?

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Next!

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Lord Snow, it appears you're the least useless person here. Go clean yourselves up. There's only so much I can stomach in a day.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Tell them your name.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Well, you couldn't be any worse than you look. See what he can do.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: On your feet. Pick up your sword. Hit him till he finds his feet. It seems they've run short of poachers and thieves down south. Now they send us squealing bloody pigs. Again, harder.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Looks like the bastardo s in love. All right then, lord Snow, you wish to defend your lady love, let's make it an exercise. You two. Three of you ought to be sufficient to make lady piggy squeal. All you've got to do is get past the bastard.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: We're done for today. Go clean the armory. That's all you're good for.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: What are you waiting for? Attack him! You, get in there.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: You think this is funny, do you? When you're out there beyond the Wall with the sun going down, do you want a man at your back? Or a sniveling boy?

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Enjoying yourselves? You look cold, boys.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: A bit nippy, yeah, by the fire, indoors. It's still summer. Do you boys even remember the last winter? How long has it been now? What, 10 years? I remember. Was it uncomfortable at Winterfell? Were there days when you just couldn't get warm, never mind how many fires your servants built?

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: That's admirable. I spent six months out there, beyond the Wall during the last winter. It was supposed to be a two-week mission. We heard a rumor Mance Rayder was planning to attack Eastwatch. So we went out to look for some of his men... Capture them, gather some knowledge. The Wildlings who fight for Mance Rayder are hard men. Harder than you'll ever be. They know their country better than we do. They knew there was a storm coming in. So they hid in their caves and waited for it to pass. And we got caught in the open. Wind so strong it yanked 100-foot trees straight from the ground, roots and all. If you took your gloves off to find your cock to have a piss, you lost a finger to the frost. And all in darkness. You don't know cold. Neither of you do. The horses died first. We didn't have enough to feed them, to keep them warm. Eating the horses was easy. But later when we started to fall... That wasn't easy. We should have had a couple of boys like you along, shouldn't we? Soft, fat boys like you. We'd have lasted a fortnight on you and still had bones leftover for soup. Soon we'll have new recruits and you lot will be passed along to the Lord Commander for assignment and they will call you men of the Night's Watch, but you'd be fools to believe it. You're boys still. And come the winter you will die... Like flies.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: So you admit you murdered Qhorin Halfhand?

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: No? You put your sword through a brother of the Night's Watch. What do you call that?

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Don't talk about the Halfhand as if you knew him. He was my brother.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: There's a difference between sneaking off to the Mole's Town brothel and sleeping with the enemy.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Impossible. You can't get 50 wildlings together before they start killing each other.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: I am acting commander here, Maester Aemon.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: And I don't trust the bastard.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: And you always know when a man's telling a lie? How did you acquire this magical power?

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: There he is, Sam the Slayer.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: If we go after them, we'll be giving them what they want. They want to draw us out, pick us off a few at a time.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: You're a champion of the common people, Lord Snow. What do you say to Brother Pyp's proposition?

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: We need to shore up Castle Black and we need to defend the Wall. That is our job.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Lord Snow. What do you think you're doing?

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: And that someone isn't you. Go find a chamber pot to empty. Go on. Do it. You traitor's bastard. Give me an excuse. Mormont's not hereto protect you now.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Get back to work. Now! I said now!

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: You think I care if they like me? We're at war.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Come on, get on with it. What are you waiting for? Summer?

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Your foray to Craster's Keep, I'll sanction it. But I won't order anyone to go with you. Volunteers only.

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: You all know why you're here Jon Snow is dead

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: I did

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: And Bowen Marsh and Othell Yarwyck and the other officers in this castle

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: You're right!

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: We've committed treason, all of us Jon Snow was my Lord Commander I had no love for him That was no secret But I never once disobeyed an order Loyalty is the foundation on which the Night's Watch is built, and the Watch means everything to me I have given my life, we have all given our lives to the Night's Watch Jon Snow was going to destroy the Night's Watch He let the wildlings through our gates, as no Lord Commander has ever done before He gave them the very land on which they reaved and raped and murdered Lord Commander Snow did what he thought was right, I've no doubt about that And what he thought was right would have been the end of us He thrust a terrible choice upon us, and we made it

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: Ser Davos, we have no cause to fight We are both anointed knights

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: I will grant amnesty to all brothers who thrown down their arms before nightfall And you, Ser Davos, I will allow you to travel south, a free man with a fresh horse

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: What?

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: We'll give you food You can bring the Red Woman with you if you like Or you can leave her here with us, whichever you choose But surrender by nightfall or this ends with blood

Name: alliser thorne
Sentence: It's time, Ser Davos Open the door and the men inside can rejoin their brothers in peace We'll even set the wolf free north of the Wall where it belongs Nobody needs to die tonight
